_sText:
Hellhound Campaign.

Includes 4 chapters/maps;

Mg_Hellhound_Gasstation_CH1
Mg_Hellhound_Subway_CH2
Mg_Hellhound_City_CH3
Mg_Hellhound_Roof_CH4

To Server Owners: For best playing experience, put only the First chapter (Gasstation) Into the Votemenu, and disable all running commands that affect the prop's weight or behaviour.

All maps created by Xquality.

Enjoy.
